intro: Tabernaemontana psychotrioides, commonly known as the psychotrioides starflower, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family, which includes many plants with milky sap and showy flowers. The plant is characterized by its star-shaped, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale pink. It thrives in warm, humid climates and requires well-drained soil for optimal growth. Due to its ornamental value, it is often cultivated in gardens and greenhouses.
